---
title: "The Competition Data Standard"
---

how does this differ from core irw? Related to kind of data used in ELO or Bradley-Luce-Terry approaches. See more [here](https://www.annualreviews.org/content/journals/10.1146/annurev-statistics-040722-061813).

- date: Datetime of the data point in a specific format (unix)
- homefield: 
- agent_a: name/id of first competitor
- agent_b: name/id of second competitor
- score_a: Score of `agent_a`
- score_b: Score of `agent_b`
- duration: Match duration or “0” (N/A)
- winner: `agent_a`, `agent_b` or `draw`
